body.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Welcome to OSHWA’s new site!","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"As we posted about previously we are officially using our brand new site! We’re so excited to have ya’ll here and to provide a much more user friendly experience to our community. There’s a ton of info packed on this site in our Resources, Programs and OSHW 101 sections, plus lots of other areas to explore.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"We’re especially happy to have our ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://certification.oshwa.org/list.html"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"certification program","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":" front and center on the homepage, showing just how many places open source hardware has reached. We also can’t help but notice that we’ve still got some places to add to the database, if you’re in one of the regions and need support on certifying please reach out at ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"mailto:info@oshwa.org"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"info@oshwa.org","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"!","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Finally, we are quickly approaching the Open Hardware Summit in Edinburgh, Scotland this year. You can learn more ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://2025.oshwa.org/"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"right here","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":" and get ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://ohs2025.eventbrite.com"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"your tickets","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":" today.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Looking forward to an excellent year of making, sharing and iterating on open source hardware together. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}
